ygData.subject: Re: Chivtrons Shall Prevail
ygData.msgSnippet: Zeni runs right into the shields as they come up and gets the shock of his life. He leans up against the wall right before the exit and wonders what was wrong

Zeni runs right into the shields as they come up and gets the shock of his
life. He leans up against the wall right before the exit and wonders what
was wrong with him battling? Arrow had shown him. Arrow feels something is
wrong.

Arrow: What the hell was that? And is anyone going to...never mind, I'll do
it, open the frigging shields!

Airbomber dodges the shots and fires back at Nightlight 10 times.

Arrow: If you don't open the shields I'll blow your head off.

Arrow was speaking to Nightlight...

----- Original Message -----
From: <airly2000@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, May 28, 2001 1:25 AM
Subject: Re: Chivtrons Shall Prevail


> Nighlight:
>
> Nighlight opened and closed the shields letting at Linzyx and her
> left the ship and left  Zeni Inside the base.
>
> The shield was up again and  Nightlight shot against airbomber 25
> energy balls
>
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> > ::Grounded/Axis and Co./Lynxiz::
> > Grounded's memory's continued to flood back to him.  The other
> half, the
> > mechanical one, in a final fight over organic life and it's future
> on
> > Cyberetron proved a failure for the organic bot.  In the battle
> they
> > raged against each other.  With a qucik snap of his wrist the
> organic
> > bot lashed his special energon whips across his arch-enemy's face,
> > blinding him instantly. He remembers how the bot crazed, firing al
> over
> > the place, and with a crazy shot it all went black for the
> protector of
> > organic life.  The shot had put his spark into stasis lock. What
> had
> > happened to his foe, his evil half, he did not know. Until not long
> ago.
> >
> > Axis looked to Aerotaur. "All right, he's yours.  I am here if you
> need
> > me"  He then turned and noticed Windlord in some trouble.  He fired
> two
> > missiles at the traiter McGowan while Lokk and Seekker continued to
> fire
> > 25 shots each at the foe.
> >
> > Lynxiz ran out after Lynxiz and spotting Stranato decides it is
> time for
> > payback. Firing three discs set for 1 second explosion on impact at
> him.
